scripts.build: yarn publish-win && yarn publish-linux && yarn copy-to-publish
scripts.clean: yarn rimraf publish-win && yarn rimraf publish-linux
scripts.copy-to-publish: yarn copyfiles -u 1 publish-win/nswag-portable.exe bin && yarn copyfiles -u 1 publish-linux/nswag-portable bin
scripts.publish-win: dotnet publish NSwag.Console/NSwag.Console.csproj --sc -c Release -r win-x64 -o publish-win
scripts.publish-linux: dotnet publish NSwag.Console/NSwag.Console.csproj --sc -c Release -r linux-x64 -o publish-linux
